title: [Sherlock] Design the 'Dynamic Mission Brief' System
description: Design the technical implementation for the 'Dynamic Mission Brief' system. This involves specifying how the Governor will detect the context of the AI's current task and automatically prepend the relevant '_CONTEXT.md' file to its instructions.

acceptance_criteria.text: Create a design document or flowchart illustrating the logic flow.
The design must specify how the system identifies the relevant context directory.
The design must detail the mechanism for prepending the context to the AI's prompt/instructions.
